name: Banana Campus
overview:
Banana Campus is a social network for college life, aiming to connect students all over the world and share uni stuff (especially notes and papers).

The purpose of the platform is to build a better university, open and more connected, where the student is the real star. Banana Campus wants to be an extension of real life in campus and a complement to other social networks, as well as the institutional websites of universities.

In Banana Campus each university has its own social network (interconnected), in which users can access to their careers spaces, assignments, teachers, notes, Erasmus blogs, flatshare ads, etc.

Banana Campus offers special discounts and offers for college students.
